ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was supported by a grant from the Special Project for Prevention and Control of Novel Coronavirus Pneumonia in Weifang Science and Technology Development Plan in 2020 (No. 2020YQFK015) to Associate Senior Technologist Qing Nie and Dr. Xingguang Li. We gratefully acknowledge the Authors and Originating and Submitting Laboratories for their sequences and meta-data shared through GISAID ( Elbe and Buckland-Merrett, 2017), on which this research is based.
